title: Random tip of the day
body:
### Description

Implement "tip of the day" entry on the Quarkus console, when starting Dev Mode. 
Optionally this could also be placed in the Dev UI as well.
Each extension could add a list of text entries for it's "tip of the day". Extensions would have a priority (weight) to make sure entries from main extensions would show up more frequently. Not sure if Quarkiverse extensions could be part of this but priority could be tweaked accordingly. 
The text must be shown at the end and contain come emojis to wrap it.
There should be a section for main Quarkus announcements, like new versions"

This idea come with the necessity to make users aware on new features, best practices, advise on wrong practices...

Examples:
"did you know if you add the quarkus-opentelemetry, you can trace requests across your services without additional code? Find more at..."

BTW, this idea started in a chat with @jponge @radcortez and @cescoffier
